Uses of Class
fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.core.FailBehavior

  • Packages that use FailBehavior 
    Package Description
    fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.core  

    • Uses of FailBehavior in fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.core

      Subclasses of FailBehavior in fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.core 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultRetryAtDelayedTimeFailBehavior
      Behavior to retry a request every minute by default until the request is successful If you want to change the default time value just extend this class and call DefaultRetryAtDelayedTimeFailBehavior.setDelayedTime(long) in DefaultRetryAtDelayedTimeFailBehavior.failAction(WebService, ArrayList) to set the time you want
      class  RetryWhenOtherSucceededFailBehavior
      Behavior to retry a request when other request has succeed
